text:
hey everyone I am in Bangkok Thailand and today 
I'm meeting up with my high school friends and

we are having dim sum at one of the classic 
dim sum restaurants of Bangkok this place has

got to be very very old it's in an old part of 
town it's called I yet I've never been here and

judging from the other people in this restaurant 
is definitely a favorite of my parents generation

but they are famous for their dim sum so let's 
take a look at what they've got to offer every

time I come to dim sum I must have my path you 
fell or steamed buns with barbecue courses with

my absolute favorite radish cake so daikon radish 
cake in hi we call this complex crispy fried

taro definitely not one of my favorite I don't 
like pero in in this form for some reason I kind

of like it in general but you know and this 
is apparently one of their specialties these

a little fried tofu and then sir fried with 
falls chilies garlic and a little bit of sugar

I think here we go I just like that they're 
so cute they're like little little dice oh

look it's really soft soft tofu soft on 
the inside like melty but the outside is

perfectly crunchy just a little Toki and just 
a sense of chilly then I can eat that all day

that's so good and of course a classic of 
any tied in some table some of you my or

condoms beautiful this one is also supposed 
to be really good Buffy it's Custer dilemma

with salted duck egg yolk but it's going to be 
really easy ah look at that it's like lava bun

that's going to be a messy one to eat 
little stop that is good so screaming do

not look for the loop and you can taste the 
salted duck egg yolk not too sleepy really

that's a must resolve and right here is a 
bowl of duck tongue I have only had DEFCON

one and I don't remember what it was like 
there we go a little piece of duck tongue

you got to spit out a little bone in the middle 
that is good I mean it's gelatinous and a little

bit taste like skin you know it's got that 
jelly quality of skin a little crunchy like

cartilage but soft and tender really tasty 
broth it's just a little disturbing to look

at that bowl and realize that there's like 
15 dots died or that one Bowl and one of my

favorites this is sticky rice wrapped in lotus 
leaf check that out and inside is a variety of

things that they consult a duck eggs pork it's 
I'm not sure what they put in here what else

they put in here but looks like a dried shrimp 
definitely there's some dried shrimps in there

and this is the highlight of the table and that is 
crispy pork belly that is so beautifully cut into

the perfect cube also comes with like a mustard 
and some sort of a dipping sauce from Hong Kong

crispy skin tender pork pork the fat 
is melt in your mouth so good so we

finally left our dim sum place overall 
I think it was really good this place

is famous for a reason I hope you 
take this out if you get a chance
